channel.title: WordPress – Xây dựng website thương mại điện tử

item.title: How to change the URLs of the posts or articles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hello, I purchased this theme, but how to change the URLs of the posts/articles? All articles have this /docs/docly-documentation/elements/ in the links. When I try to edit, it does not let me change. I do not want the word ‘docs’ or ‘docly-documentation’ in my links. please tell, how do I fix that. thanks. Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I purchased this theme, but how to change the URLs of the posts/articles? All articles have this /docs/docly-documentation/elements/ in the links.
When I try to edit, it does not let me change. I do not want the word ‘docs’ or ‘docly-documentation’ in my links. please tell, how do I fix that. thanks.

Thanks

item.title: Appearance > Import Demo Data
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hey, We can not import the second Creative Agency theme. The other works fine but this one we really want and we cant import it. It imports the 2nd one in the attachment when we click on the 4th one to import Can you please help us import the theme demo we want. best regards
item.content:encoded:
Hey,

We can not import the second Creative Agency theme. The other works fine but this one we really want and we cant import it. It imports the 2nd one in the attachment when we click on the 4th one to import

Can you please help us import the theme demo we want.

best regards

item.title: Advanced Custom Fields PRO
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hi dear support team, Advanced Custom Fields PRO requires update but it failed when I try from wp-admin Aggiornamento del plugin Advanced Custom Fields PRO (1/1) C’è stato un errore durante l’aggiornamento di Advanced Custom Fields PRO: Pacchetto di aggiornamento non disponibile. Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hi dear support team,

Advanced Custom Fields PRO requires update but it failed when I try from wp-admin

Aggiornamento del plugin Advanced Custom Fields PRO (1/1)
C’è stato un errore durante l’aggiornamento di Advanced Custom Fields PRO: Pacchetto di aggiornamento non disponibile.

Thanks

item.title: One page template
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hello, where can I find the one-page document template? I updated the theme, however I cant seem to find the onepage documentation template
item.content:encoded:
Hello, where can I find the one-page document template?

I updated the theme, however I cant seem to find the onepage documentation template

item.title: Theme fails to load to WordPress
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Docly WordPress Theme fails to load into WordPress. My login information for WordPress/SiteGround.com is. The margins in this first section is huge and we are trying to reduce it so the page doesn’t have a huge empty space, but when we move the margins to -250+, the buttons in the first 3-4 rows won’t […]
item.content:encoded:
The Docly WordPress Theme fails to load into WordPress. My login information for WordPress/SiteGround.com is.

The margins in this first section is huge and we are trying to reduce it so the page doesn’t have a huge empty space, but when we move the margins to -250+, the buttons in the first 3-4 rows won’t work anymore.

Please help!

Thanks
